attributes.action: Stop anti Chrisitan laws of any sort
attributes.additional_details: Christianity is the bedrock of  British culture and should not be stopped in any way. Our society has been built on the principles of Christianity, which has created a flourishing nation. Banning Christian practices in public spaces is discrimination against a particular group of people as no such bans are being forced on other religious groups and ideologies. If such laws are passed, this will be a massive detriment to our way of living and society as we know it will crumble.
attributes.background: I want the government to drop any plans to criminalise christian practice. Such as prayer, evangelism and singing in public places.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

The Government have not announced any plans to criminalise Christian practice.
